B1.body: Ladies and gentelcolts, let me welcome you here.
B1.speaker: Bellgates

B3.body: So, without further ado, I will introduce you to my development of my new drug for non-magical control of the aging process.
B3.speaker: Bellgates

B4.body: We all know, that in history the facts of the use of aging control spells by unicorns with a very large magical potential   have already been recorded
B4.speaker: Bellgates

B5.body: However, with all due respect, Minister, there are only a few such unicorns. And thanks to my development, we can put such control on the flow.
B5.speaker: Bellgates

B6.body: Thanks to this drug called “Phoenix1”, we can both slow down the aging of the body, and accelerate it-depending on the configuration of the constituent elements of the drug
B6.speaker: Bellgates

B7.body: The only drawback identified at the moment is that in order for the drug to work, it is necessary that the patient was unconscious.
B7.speaker: Bellgates

B8.body: However, even in this case, you can find a practical application. For example, in the current war, you can significantly speed up the process of creating soldiers.
B8.speaker: Bellgates

B9.body: A conditional combat-ready soldier can theoretically be trained from an ordinary foal in a little over a year
B9.speaker: Bellgates

B10.body: However, to confirm these words, I am ready to provide you with the result of the drug on the above example.
B10.speaker: Bellgates
